page.title: AstraZeneca's Crestor May Harm Kidneys
page.text: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Twenty-nine patients who took AstraZeneca Plc's <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AZN.L target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AZN.L</A> <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AZN.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AZN.N</A> anti-cholesterol drug Crestor have developed kidney damage, a U.S. consumer group said on Friday as it called again for a ban on the medicine.
